articles.title: Chinese regulator fines Didi Global $1.19b over data security violations - CGTN
articles.description: China's cyber security regulator fined Didi Global 8.026 billion yuan ($1.19 billion) on Thursday over data security and user privacy violations, concluding a one-year review.
articles.content:
China's cyber security regulator fined Didi Global 8.026 billion yuan ($1.19 billion) on Thursday over data security and user privacy violations, concluding a one-year review.

articles.title: Rupee fall against dollar, leaves parents worried.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: The fall in rupee against the US dollar will be pinching the Indian parents and their wards studying and aspiring to study in that country, said experts and parents.
